title: crashing
content: I'm running Firefox in Windows 12 and am noticing that without me doing anything the browser will close by itself on a regular basis. What can I do to stop this from happening?
creator: sieb

title: Can't open New Yorker

creator: icgriff

title: How do I remove blank space at top of page?
content: There is so much wasted space between the menu bar and tabs. How do I get rid of this space? Also, how can I make tabs smaller so I can see them on the page without scrolling to the sides? Thank you
creator: CanineCountryGSD
